events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all and I haven't used it.
The customer's message includes a refund request related to sizing issues, assigning case to Refund cluster.
The customer support case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'd be happy to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused with all original tags attached?
Sure, my order number is 4589321. The jacket is brand new, still with all tags intact and in its original packaging.
Thanks for the details! We will initiate your refund process immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the shipping label to return the jacket.
We have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Checking in to confirm that you have shipped the jacket back and to let you know your refund should be processed shortly.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday using the prepaid label. Thank you very much for your support and assistance.
Your refund has been completed and the amount should appear in your account within 2-3 business days. Thank you for your patience.
We are closing this support case now. Please reach out if you need any further assistance in the future.
